section.p: Docfacto Grabit is a screen capture tool developed specifically for the Eclipse IDE and can be used as an image viewer. Image files such as .bmp, .gif, .png, .jpg, .jpeg, ico. and .tiff can be viewed and edited within the IDE using Grabit.

When the Grabit button is clicked, the default action is to take a screen shot of the desktop(s) but this can be changed to a timed shot. The timer is particularly useful when taking shots of menus because most menus disappear when a key is pressed on the keyboard.
If unsaved, newly taken screenshots would be discarded on application close without a prompt!
